member.name: T:Aarsys.ShoutcastStats.Components.Listener
member.summary: Represents a listener with details such as Hostname, UserAgent etc.

member.name: T:Aarsys.ShoutcastStats.Components.ShoutcastServer
member.summary: Creates an instance of a shoutcast server and gives access to all the properties of the xml file

members.member:
Create an instance of this class
The Streaming Url of the server Example : http://localhost:8000/admin.cgi?mode=viewxml&pass=adminpass Should be gennerated with the Modulesettings as SC_IP, SC_Port, SC_Password

member.name: M:Aarsys.ShoutcastStats.Components.ShoutcastServer.Refresh
member.summary: Gets an updated version of the Shoutcast xml file with update statistics More useful at WinForm applications

member.name: P:Aarsys.ShoutcastStats.Components.ShoutcastServer.ShoutcastServerUrl
member.summary: The Streaming url of the shoutcast server Example : http://localhost:8000/admin.cgi?mode=viewxml&pass=adminpass

member.summary: Contains all the values from the WEBDATA region of the xml file
